titleInfo.title: Horizons for the Enactive Mind: Values, Social Interaction, and Play
Enaction: Towards a New Paradigm for Cognitive Science

bibliographicCitation.ieee: E. Di Paolo, M. Rohde, and H. De Jaegher, “Horizons for the Enactive Mind: Values, Social Interaction, and Play”, Enaction: Towards a New Paradigm for Cognitive Science, J. Stewart, O. Gapenne, and E. Di Paolo, eds., Cambridge, MA: MIT Press, 2010, pp.33-88.
